author: Wuzzy

game.author: Wuzzy
game.name: repixture
game.short_description: Simplistic sandbox survival game that plays in mostly lush biomes in a mostly peaceful world and only simple technologies.
game.title: Repixture

long_description:
This mod replaces the builtin health and breath indicators by nice little “progress bars” which show an icon, a label and a numerical value plus maximum.

There are many settings to customize them.
name: hudbars
short_description: Replaces the default health and breath symbols by horizontal colored bars with text showing the number. Extensible.
title: HUD Bars
